EMLYON is one of the best business schools in France and ranked top 5 in Europe in management masters. The curriculum is set at 3 locations: France, Switzerland, and China, a true multi-campus, multi-country experience. The program offers students to gain business management and marketing skills (for example, in events and service sector, CRM, retails, luxury property, etc.), and nurtures personal development through professional and social networking within and around key markets associated with the luxury industry.

Investment/Corporate Advisory and Education Professional
May 15, 2014, Manmeet was Demi S.’s teacher

I've seen Demi grow from an eager student to a keen entrepreneur and marketing professional. She has worked on some very impressive assignments and projects in the last few years and delivered results one would expect from those who are older and more experienced. As an individual she possesses equal measures of guts, wisdom and tenacity that I'm sure will propel her to greater heights. If you're aim is to build a consumer focused business in China especially in the luxury segment or focused on the young Chinese female consumer, Demi would be an absolute asset on your team.
